title: Los Santos Drug Wars
headline: Los Santos Drug Wars
subtitle: Experience 11 Story Missions, Unlock a New Acid Business, and More Free Rewards
content:
Answer the call from Ron and then head to Blaine County to get started. Once youâ€™ve met the Fooliganz, check in at The Freakshop to play through all story missions.

Along the way, you'll unlock new rewards and opportunities, such as the Acid Lab to create a new business selling your own brand of psychedelics, a free Manchez Scout C to help deliver your goods, a free Ocelot Virtue supercar, and more.
